altername_name: Zennou Series Vol. 03: Akiyama Jin Kyouju Kanshuu: Zennou JinJin 2
全脑系列Vol.03 - 秋山仁教授监修 - 全脑JINJIN 2
name: MinDStorm 2
overview: Mind Body Soul - Mindstorm 2 is the sequel to the best-selling Nintendo DS game of twisted mental puzzles that utilise all four corners of the brain, from logic puzzles to analytical conundrums. Multiple puzzle types across a various of genres, with ever increasing difficulty levels to give fans of Brain Training games more to think about. Features: - Four genres of mind games incorporating Logic, Analytics, Memory and mental endurance - Three puzzle types per genre (12 games in total) - Five levels of difficulty per game - Five to seven puzzles are automated i.e. infinite number of games - Collection of bonus unlocks to change your mentor avatar
